profile:
I am a local service and garage door installer for the Barrie and surrounding area for 18 years. Customer satisfaction is a key factor for myself and my business. 

Please feel free to either email or phone  for any day to day concerns with your doors, or for any quotes towards new ones. 

We provide removal and disposal of existing garage doors, and provide a selection of newer styles in a variety of colours for your home. 

Also available are different styles of garage door openers. We offer maintenance on all doors and openers to prevent unnecessary problems for you during the changing seasons.

Roly's Garage Doors and Openers
Garage Doors and Garage Door Repair in Barrie and Orillia
